pubspec.name: lottie
pubspec.description: Render After Effects animations natively on Flutter. This package is a pure Dart implementation of a Lottie player.

pubspec.name: lottie
pubspec.description: Lottie is a mobile library for Android and iOS that parses Adobe After Effects animations exported as json and renders them natively on mobile!. This package is a pure Dart implementation of a Lottie player.

pubspec.name: lottie
pubspec.description: Use lottie in flutter to render animations for iOS and Android. This package is a pure Dart implementation of a Lottie player.
